title: [1.8][SSP/SMP][汉化]Reinforced tools——增强工具
author: Ayamuta
txt_content:
本帖最后由 d_amask 于 2015-5-14 22:20 编辑 

增强工具模组(1.8版本)增强工具MOD可以让MC合成更多的工具和武器用石棒、铁棒和钻石棒合成的武器可以增加工具的耐久度还可以用黑曜石、钻石碎片升级合成工具和武器绿宝石也可以升级工具,增加了"钛合金" 原帖介绍&图片The Base Items
5 of the items include the stone rod, iron rod, and diamond rod and increases the tool's durability by 7.5%, 25% + 8, and 50% + 64, respectively.  The other two items have recently been added that increase the efficiency of your tools.  They are the Diamond shards and obsidian shard.  (Obsidian shards are better). 
The rods can be used in place as sticks to make pickaxes, axes, shovels, and/or hoes. 
You may increase the durability of all forms of tools from wood to diamond. 
Diamond and obsidian shards can be used on reinforced diamond pickaxes only. 
Emeralds can be used on reinforced diamond pickaxes only. 
Titanium Ingots which can be used to create the fully titanium Pickaxe, axe, shovel, and hoe. 
Obtaining materials
Obsidian Shards:  You have a chance to collect these from mining obsidian. 
Diamond Shards:  You have a chance to collect these from mining Diamond. 
Titanium Ingots:  Can be collected once you create the Scavenger Pickaxe.  When using the scavenger Pickaxe on anything, you have a chance of obtaining a Titanium Ingot. 
Crafting Recipes
stone rod: two stone blocks stacked. (Like making sticks from wood) 
iron rod: two iron ingot stacked. 
diamond rod: two diamonds stacked. 
Use the rods as if they were sticks for pickaxes. 

模组物品展示

 合成方法合成方法和原版基本一样,就是换成了其他棒子   升级为2.0的就像上面这样,用钻石碎片围一圈   3.0的工具就用黑曜石围一圈本帖更新日志2015/5/14 更新1.8 v1.4.0原帖更新日志原帖换没有写
